rows.label: tlk401002_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, um, I saw these weird
bird people.

rows.label: tlk401002_msg0002
rows.name:
Not like Nopon, a bit bigger than that,
and really, um, birdy-looking!

rows.label: tlk401002_msg0003
rows.name:
I think I saw pictures of them before
in a picture book, but I can't remember
what they're called...

rows.label: tlk401002_msg0009
rows.name: Thanks, that was really bugging me...

rows.label: tlk401002_msg0010
rows.name:
But what would a bunch of Tirkin
be doing in a place like this?
